dublin_core.dcvalue: Closing Plenary Public Private Partnership to Close the Last Mile Connectivity Gap Looking Forward Our closing plenary taps into highly recognized corporate partners who are providing farreaching technical capability for last mile connectivity in support of improved health in low and middle income countries Facebook Google Microsoft Philanthropies and QualComm Wireless Reach are all facilitating last mile connectivity and affordable access to the Internet and content in low and middle income countries Join us in closing this year s Global Digital Health Forum as we hear more about this innovative work from headquarters strategy to local technical implementation Presented by Jackie Chang Director of Global Partnerships Facebook
